Key Match Events: Chris Jordan took a hat-trick and four wickets in five balls
Jos Buttler made an unbeaten 83 off 38 balls
Post-Match Reflections: England captain Jos Buttler expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
England bowler Chris Jordan said he wants to focus on the team's performance rather than individual achievements
USA skipper Aaron Jones acknowledged their poor shot selection and lack of discipline
Adil Rashid highlighted the team's exceptional performance and his own bowling efforts
England is through to the semi-finals and will face either South Africa, West Indies, Afghanistan, or Bangladesh in the next round
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chris Jordan's hat-trick felt really good and he'll cherish the moment
The game was played in Barbados
England will know their opponents in the semi-finals within the next 48 hours
